summary: This document is an email chain from August 13, 2019, discussing the drafting of a notification regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death. The participants debate the wording, specifically whether to state Epstein was in the custody of the U.S. Marshal Service or the Bureau of Prisons at the time of his death, and propose final language confirming his death on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased defendant in a federal criminal case. The email chain discusses the notification of his death while in custody.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died while in custody at the Manhattan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein died on August 10, 2019, while in custody at the Manhattan Correctional Center.
The email chain shows internal government discussion about the precise wording for a public notification of Epstein's death.
There was a debate among officials about whether to attribute custody to the U.S. Marshal Service (USMS) or the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) in the notification.
The document indicates the notification was being drafted in response to a query that came up in the 'VNS system'.
The final proposed language was to state: 'On August 10, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein died while in custody at the Manhattan Correctional Center.'
